text: “Angtuk poongna esikme Chorazin nangdiang! angtuk poongna esikme Bethsaida nangdiang um! nangni diangnga intho chuon inlak kha Tyre li Sidon diang inleitho inchu, buorasongkol kahak inta, khat-um inkilrahut inthekthuon inta inmani'n manu makheiya inmalung kha apha matiang leithuuljei inte. Isa 23:1-18; Ezek 26:1–28:26; Jo 3:4-8; Amo 1:9,10; Zech 9:2-4
